description: Adhera Therapeutics, Inc. focuses on the discovery and development of drugs. The company was formerly known as Marina Biotech, Inc. and changed its name to Adhera Therapeutics, Inc. in October 2018. Adhera Therapeutics, Inc. is based in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
ceo: Dr. Zahed  Subhan B.S., BS, J.D., L.L.B., LLB (Law), M.B.A., M.S., M
